snippet: A company tries to win over investors for a huge merger in the natural resources business. We visited multinationals staking a claim in venture capital. And Andrew Ross Sorkin pointed to the man behind Facebook's I.P.O. debacle. A look back on our...
abstract: A company tries to win over investors for a huge merger in the natural resources business. We visited multinationals staking a claim in venture capital. And Andrew Ross Sorkin pointed to the man behind Facebook's I.P.O. debacle. A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.

headline.main: Week in Review: Off to the Principal's Office
